title: Tech Lead Rejection Verdicts Event Schema
description: Schema for tl_verdicts event - records TL's acceptance or overruling of Developer rejections. Single source of truth for rejection resolution.
$comment: session_id and event_type are NOT required in payload - injected by save-event CLI

session_id.description: Session identifier. Note: When using save-event CLI, session_id is passed as first arg and stored in DB record - NOT required in JSON payload.

iteration.description: Review iteration when verdicts were issued

verdicts.description: List of TL verdicts on Developer rejections

issue_id.description: Original TL issue ID that Developer rejected

verdict.description: ACCEPTED = TL agrees with rejection (issue closed). OVERRULED = TL disagrees (issue remains blocking)

overruled_count.description: Rejections TL disagreed with (issues remain blocking)

x-dedup-key.description: Deduplication key to prevent duplicate events
